alert.note: Alert for Phillips (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued March 28 at 3:16PM CDT until March 29 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...DANGEROUS FIRE WEATHER POSSIBLE TUESDAY... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY... * AFFECTED AREA...In Kansas, Fire Weather Zone 005 Phillips. * WINDS...Southwest 15 to 20 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. * TIMING...1PM to 8PM Tuesday. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 20 to 25 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that ignite may spread rapidly and exhibit extreme fire behavior. Use extreme caution if engaging in activities that could lead to fire ignition.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.
